name: Antique Iron Key
description: A large, ornate key made of iron, its surface marred by rust. Despite its age, it feels solid and weighty in your hand.

name: Sleek Keycard
description: A thin, blue keycard with embedded circuitry. Its smooth surface occasionally flickers with tiny blue lights.

name: Leaf-shaped Key
description: A key shaped like a leaf, its surface a vibrant green. It feels surprisingly sturdy despite its delicate appearance.

name: Golden Skeleton Key
description: A skeleton key made of pure gold, its teeth intricately carved. It gleams brightly even in dim light.

name: Crystal Shard Key
description: A key-shaped shard of purple crystal. It hums softly and feels warm to the touch, as if imbued with magical energy.

name: Sand-etched Key
description: A key made of compacted sand, its surface etched with intricate patterns. It's surprisingly sturdy despite its sandy composition.
